title: Senior Data Engineer
description: Project tech-stack: Airflow, Amazon API, Spark, S3, Pandas, Python (Django), Databricks,ABOUT THE ROLE:,We‚Äôre looking for a Senior Data Engineer, who will act as a fully dedicated, integrated extension of the engineering team. You will be solely focused on our project, attending daily standups, working hand-in-hand with other developers through the integration process, supporting the back-end, maximizing the overlap of the teams across time zones.,About the project:,The startup we work with started three years ago with no legacy code. The Client wants to build easy-to-use valuation tools for e-commerce stores (Amazon, eBay, Etsy, Shopify, or other) - range of valuations based on key business metrics, like sales, growth and profitability; historical valuations to understand how performance changes over time; areas of potential improvement.,About the client:,Growth capital company that helps to build out online stores on Amazon, eBay, Etsy, Shopify, or other e-commerce platforms, with business tools and proprietary solutions that gives a competitive edge of online presence. Capital-as-a-Service (CaaS) solution that allows platforms and marketplaces to offer custom funding solutions to amplify customer growth with a unique suite of APIs and SDKs.,Location:,Remote: Poland, Wroclaw/Krakow,Skills & Experience:,4+ years of data engineering experience;,Fluent in at least one programming language (Python preferred);,Strong programming skills (data structures, SOLID, Clean Code, Design Patterns and so on),Strong experience and understanding of relational and distributed databases;,Strong experience with at least one cloud provider (AWS preferred);,Experience with at least on scheduler type (Airflow, Event Bridge, Prefect, Dagster),Experience with data frameworks (pandas, spark),Experience with Big Data infrastructure tools such as EMR, Databricks,Experience working with 3rd party API services;,Creation, maintenance and support of data pipelines;,Understanding of ETL, data design, and data governance;,Troubleshoot and improve the infrastructure required for optimal extraction, transformation, and loading of data from a variety of data sources using SQL, Spark, and other big data technologies;,Upper-intermediate English or above.,Nice to have:,Understanding of integration with BI tools;,Knowledge and work experience of using Kubernetes;,Basic knowledge of IAC (e.g., Terraform);,Delta Lake knowledge.,Responsibilities,Maintain high standards of software quality within the team by establishing good practices and habits;,Build microservices that interact with internal systems and third-party APIs/services;,Ensuring the goals are met and ensuring the quality of the code via a standard code review process;,Working according to the Kanban process.

title: Python Developer (API)

title: Python Developer (with Terraform experience)
description: Healthcare project about the healing power of music and its positive impact on people who have neurologic injuries and diseases. By using the product, people have access to individual song experiences that improve their ability to walk. Client's company built a partnership with the Universal Music Group - the world leader in music-based entertainment, so the product has a database with an outstanding amount of songs that can be used as a treatment. Just imagine - healing while enjoying your favorite song.,Project Team,Few Scrum teams, each up to 5 team members. We're hiring people to build a new Scrum team that should contain 1 Senior backend (Python) Developer, 1 Python Developer, and 1 Senior Manual QA Engineer. Each team has its Product Manager/PO. We value the ability to learn and grow together above knowing any particular technology,Manage clinical data within clinical databases and backend systems,Drive technical investments from the early exploration of ideas to delivering integral parts of our stack, balancing short-term goals with long-term architectural vision,Work collaboratively in a small, focused product team with other developers, QA engineers, and business stakeholders to develop backend cloud systems, partner integrations, and data support tools,18 working days of paid vacation,10 working days of sick leave annually (5 days paid at 100% and 5 days at 75% rate of your average monthly salary),50% cost compensation for English courses at the office,Flexible work schedule,Additional days off for special occasions, national holidays off,A competitive and rewarding salary based on performance appraisals/knowledge evaluation,Possibility to share and gain knowledge on regular tech talks,Friendly and professional team,Innovative projects with advanced technologies,Corporate events,Remote work,Accounting service

title: Senior Full-Stack Engineer (Python/React )
description: Our Swiss client is an independent, partner-owned investment firm founded in 2013, with a growing team of currently 70 people and offices in Switzerland (Pf√§ffikon SZ & K√ºsnacht ZH), the United States (New York), Ireland (Dublin), Liechtenstein (Vaduz), and Hong Kong. We are dedicated to a long-term, global investment strategy focused on public equity markets.,Our highly disciplined investment process combines fundamental research expertise and advanced data science. We aim to identify high-quality mid-cap stocks with 2X return potential over a time horizon of 5‚Äì7 years, equivalent to a 10‚Äì15% return per annum. What sets us apart from others is our collective decision-making, the level of insight and transparency we offer to our investors, and the use of technology to enhance all aspects of our business.,The technology department comprises 20 members ‚Äì 6 Quant Researcher, 5 Data Engineers and 8 Fullstack Developers. We believe in collaboration and collective team intelligence while encouraging individual contributions.,Responsibilities:,Develop, test, and maintain our web application using Python and React.,Design and implement user interfaces using React.,Develop and maintain Python backend services.,Monitor the application and ensure problems are addressed and fixed.,Stay up-to-date with industry trends and advancements in web development and bring new ideas and solutions to the organization.,Participate in code reviews and provide constructive feedback to team members.,Provide technical guidance and mentorship to juniors.,This role requires a candidate who is passionate about data and finance, works well in a collaborative team-based environment, and is proactive and intrinsically motivated to go the extra mile.,A Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science or related field.,Expert Knowledge in Python with experience in organizing large code bases. We rely on flask, sqlalchemy, celery heavily.,Experience with Frontend Development using TypeScript and React.,Proficient in data modelling and structuring relational databases. Proficient in SQL.,Experience with modern data tools is a plus (like pandas, dask, pyspark).,Experience with Infrastructure / DevOps is a plus (Docker, Cloud, Azure).,Experience with data visualization is a plus (like D3.js).,A good understanding of Finance is a plus (for example Financials, balance sheets, accounting data, FX).,Bachelor's Degree.

title: Senior FullStack Software Engineer (React/Python)
description: We are looking for a Senior FullStack Software Engineer (React/Python) to join our ambitious team for a full-time position (in Europe). You will be a part of a team that will be working on a platform(HoReCa)-which is one of the most investment-attractive startups (USA) in the field of hospitality. In the summer of 2020, raised a new $ 50 million(and earlier received an investment from the Alexa Fund (AWS)).,This platform helps promote and sell unique guest experiences for any occasion. The platform gives control of and insight into the entire guest experience.,Also, it enables us to automatically drive revenue & profitability by leveraging data to build direct relationships, deliver exceptional experiences, and increase repeat business. This project has been on the market for over 10 years and continues to develop actively!,Our team focused on venue groups(large entities that have many restaurants) and developing performant and highly available APIs, implementing advanced algorithms, crafting pixel-perfect interfaces, designing an architecture for observability, localizing for a global audience, using data science to generate high-impact insights, scale our infrastructure, and much, much more.,Our engineering culture values technical excellence, ownership, and customer obsession to solve hard problems the right way.,- be exposed to the challenges of working at scale and thrive when solving,complex technical problems ‚Äì whether it‚Äôs fine-tuning beautiful UX and design, developing API services for our products, or just seeing features end-to-end.,- work closely with other engineers, product managers, and designers, to develop our mobile and cloud technology stack via an agile software development process, and engineer real solutions that ship directly to our customers.,- Write code based on functional specifications and technical design. Adhere to architectural standards and develop designs that consider the impact on other aspects of the database and appropriately leverage existing code.,- Perform code reviews, identify potential issues to reduce technical debt, and provide coding best practice recommendations.,- At least 5 years of experience developing web applications,- Experience in Python backend,- Experience with React on the front-end part,- Strong knowledge and experience with Redux, TypeScript,- Excellent interpersonal, written, and verbal communication skills.,- Strong sense of self-motivation, organization, and attention to detail; strong analytical skills,- Experience with Scrum/Agile methodology, CI/CD,- English: upper-intermediate level (both speaking and writing),- Strong knowledge or experience with NodeJS,- Experience or strong knowledge of Google Cloud Platform (GCP):,AppEngine, Datastore (potentially moving to Firestore), BigQuery.,Python/Django/GoogleCloud/MySQL/React/Redux/TS.,- Interesting full-time position on the new project,- Competitive compensation (based on market data, but also depending on the technical level of the candidate),- Flexible work schedule,- 3 health packages to choose,- Annual paid vacation and state holidays celebration,- Free English classes (online),- Individual approach to a profession,- Lack of bureaucracy and micromanagement,- Modern, comfortable office facilities (a barbecue zone, kitchens, lounge,rooms, coffee machines, etc.),- Foreign business trips,- On-site parking lot and charge station for Electric Cars,- Corporate gifts, celebrations, and fun activities,- Sports activities: ping-pong, soccer, work-out

title: Senior Full Stack Developer (Python/ReactJS)
description: We are looking for a Senior Full Stack Developer (Python/ReactJS) on a full-time basis.,The company was founded in 2012. We work with both startups and mature businesses to create high-end products for effective performance and growth.,Our focus is on complex long-term web and mobile projects, in which we are fully responsible for the technical part, from planning a roadmap to deploying and maintaining applications.¬†We believe that good projects are born of transparency and synergy between the client and the team.,Web and mobile no-code platform that serves as a tool for managing everything needed to get work done: spreadsheets, documents, collaboration tools, databases, file management products and automation capabilities ‚Äî all in one place.,We have been working on the project from scratch for 4 years. At the same time, of course, there is always a workload and there are no situations when tasks suddenly ended (in theory, if there is such a thing, downtime will be paid, which is indicated in the contract).,We look forward to hearing from you!

title: Lead/Senior Python Engineer
description: Job Description,Lead the design and development of a microservices-based product using Python,The role requires expertise in Python, Azure, Microservices architecture, CI/CD pipeline setup, team management and mentorship skills,Strong leadership and mentorship skills.,Extensive practical experience with Python, Microservices/Serverless architecture, Azure cloud platform.,Proficient in Relational and Document databases,,Experience with CI/CD pipeline setup and maintenance.,Problem-solving and troubleshooting skills.,Excellent communication and collaboration skills.,Advanced English communication skills,Job Responsibilities,Lead the design and development of the product.,Ensure quality and timely delivery of software components.,Exercise judgment within generally defined best practices and policies in selecting methods and techniques for providing solutions.,Present status at daily scrum meetings and work product at sprint reviews,Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify and prioritize features.,Troubleshoot and resolve technical issues.,Ensure adherence to software development best practices and standards.,Provide estimates and plan work within the iteration in order to achieve expected results,Effective collaboration with other teams which are working on the same product,Conduct code reviews to ensure high-quality code is produced.,Implement unit testing to validate software components.,Department/Project Description,Client is a fully integrated, global provider of rail solutions across rolling stock, signalling, operation, service & maintenance, digital technology and turnkey solutions. With a presence in 38 countries across six continents and over 12,000 employees, our mission is to contribute to society through the continuous development of superior rail transport solutions. We are proud of our global achievements, from our world famous ‚Äòbullet trains‚Äô, to our signalling solutions and turnkey projects, state of the-art traffic management and digital solutions. Drawing on the wider Hitachi Group‚Äôs market-leading technology and research-and-development capabilities, we strive for industry leading innovations and solutions that can deliver value for customers and sustainable railway systems that benefit wider society.

title: Robotics Advanced Automation Engineer

Projects can vary greatly, so you should like working in a changing environment and enjoy taking on new challenges.,YOU ARE,An expert in C/C++ and Python programming, with at least 3 years of relevant experience,A holder of an MSc or Ph.D. degree in Computer Science, Applied Mathematics, Robotics, or a related field,Deeply understanding, developing, and implementing complex, and efficient algorithms,Skilled in networking and different communication protocols,Showing a concept of HW/SW architecture design,Having end-to-end knowledge of typical automation system setups from the sensor to the algorithm (DCS infrastructure, PLC, operator stations, OPC),Aware of control theory (MPC, MHE, LQG, Kalman filtering, decentralized control system analysis),Confident in mathematical optimization (NLP, QP, MILP),The one who knows first-principle modeling of dynamic systems,An expert in AWS cloud services development,Highly attentive to detail; skilled in analytics and problem-solving,Having Upper-Intermediate English level (both spoken and written),The following experience will be considered as an advantage.,Robotics frameworks: ROS, or ROS2,CODESYS, or DIN EN 61131 PLC programming,Real-time computation, low-level motor control (control theory, state estimation), and real-time control,IoT background, development for ARM (STM32, etc.), RTOS,Any Programmable Logic Controls: (PLCs), SCADA,Technical pre-sales activities, C-level presentation

title: Full-stack Python + React Developer

Open collaboration with other software engineering and operations squads is commonplace, ensuring a DevOps culture that enables delivery of scalable solutions.,‚óè Experience with Python and JavaScript (preferably React),‚óè Node.js would be a plus,‚óè Experience with containerization technologies such as Docker and,Kubernetes,‚óè Appetite for learning new programming languages and frameworks,‚óè Excellent interpersonal skills and the ability to work in a multi-disciplinary, cross-functional squad,‚óè Familiarity with software engineerings best practices such as Agile, TDD, CI/CD, and IaC,‚óè At least Upper-Intermediate level of English,‚óè Exposure to one or more: Traditional RDBMS, Snowflake, Elasticsearch,‚óè Knowledge of graph technologies such as RDF(S), SPARQL, graph and,triple-stores, ideally GraphDB.,‚óè Experience building Data Pipelines for large data sets.,‚óè Experience with Natural Language Processing techniques,‚óè Be part of an autonomous team designing and implementing a robust data layer to support research teams involved in making key decisions for the business,‚óè Contribute to DevOps strategies, building large-scale knowledge graphs and biological networks.,‚óè Experience working with colleagues locally and abroad,‚óè Opportunities for self-realization working on challenging projects using new technologies and tools,‚óè Friendly team and enjoyable working environment,‚óè Social and corporate events,‚óè Possibility for career development,‚óè Participation in professional trainings, meetups,‚óè Medical & family care programs,‚óè Various sport activities coverage,‚óè Fully paid by Forte 5 sick days during working year,‚óè Internal English courses provided by Forte Teacher,‚óè Comfortable and fully equipped workplace

title: Senior Python Backend Engineer
description: We are developing an innovative Conversational Voice-based AI that automates order-taking in restaurants. Our main use case is automating orders in the drive-thru, a huge business in the US. More than 70% of quick-service restaurants' revenue originates in the drive-thru!,Drive-thru restaurants have employees multi-task by taking orders, packing food, taking payments, and more. This translates to long wait times and extremely high stress for employees. Currently, the restaurants are experiencing a major hiring crisis due to this extreme stress and increasing minimum wage.,Most quick-service restaurants had begun to search for a more elegant solution that improves customer experience, increases speed, accuracy, average ticket size, and reduces employee stress.,Our AI greets the customer, takes the order, and inserts it into the point of sale freeing up the employees to focus on other tasks.,Understanding an order in the drive-thru using voice is not an easy task and requires deep technology to get to the required high completion rate of orders. The challenges include a very noisy environment, unique speech patterns due to the customer's indecisiveness, different accents, gender, ages, speech from other people in the car, complex multi-turn unstructured conversation, low latency, and more. In order to solve big challenges, we are developing our own speech and natural language understanding tech from the ground up.,We are a group of experts in Speech, NLU, and Backend SW. We strongly believe in impact-driven employment where you can work from wherever you're most comfortable and effective. Because of the myriad of challenges and the fast pace, each team member gets to experience a lot of professional growth and ownership.,About the Role & Responsibilities:,- Our backend is developed all in Python running in the cloud over k8s.,- It's not a typical backend interacting with a UI frontend. It handles audio streams in real-time and runs our key AI algorithms.,- The role involves designing and implementing complex parts of the backend. This involves distributed architecture as well as concurrency while taking into consideration performance and scale.,Requirements,- 5+ years experience in Python,- Experience in SW design and backend dev,- Developed and deployed multiple projects used in production,- Experience with Docker, Kubernetes, Microservices, CI/CD, Clouds (AWS/GCP/Azure),Preferred Qualifications:,- Experience with real-time audio processing,Join us to be a part of an amazing team with great vibes, a company with a lot of freedom of movement, interesting and unique challenges, and an opportunity to influence and build something big.

title: Software Engineer (Back-end)
description: Do you have a passion about writing scalable code and delivering amazing product experiences? Are you ambitious and full of energy, and ready to start a new chapter in your career? We are looking for a talented Back-end Software Engineer to join our team on a full-time basis and assist us in disrupting one of the biggest industries out there!,Get to know us,YourHero (Douleutaras/YourPro) is the leading tech-enabled company for home services that solves the hassle of hiring a reliable professional. We launched in 2015 and since then we have helped more than 700.000 customers find the right expert for their job across 4 European countries. By leveraging technology and our unique business model we are fixing and improving it bit by bit and day by day. This is how we are serving our mission every day, creating an ecosystem of thousands of growing entrepreneurs that solve consumer problems.,We want to be the definitive services company - the app you go to every time you need a job done. Today, we possess the best KPIs in the industry, have generated more than ‚Ç¨100m for our 5000+ professionals, possess an NPS of 70+, collected 80.000+ customer reviews, already expanded internationally and are supported by top-tier European investors.,And we‚Äôre just getting started.,The scale of the opportunity ahead of us is immense. The global services market is valued at ‚Ç¨6 Trillion, yet less than 5% of that is online. Contrast that with the digital disruption of countless other industries - from banking and travel to retail and communications - and it‚Äôs clear that our journey in the services sector has only just begun.,In 2020 our international journey began. From 2021 onwards, we are launching new cities in new countries, every year. Join us in this incredible journey and be a major part in disrupting the ‚Ç¨6 Trillion services market and becoming the global leader under our international brand name YourHero.,Our future goals,Our vision is to build a product that the world has never seen before, by innovating in the home services market and offering our users a truly disruptive experience. We feel that finding a home expert should not be a laborious task but should be as easy as eating a cake (yummy!). Thus we envision to build a product that fundamentally changes the way home tasks are performed. Using this product innovation we plan to rapidly expand to several countries in the next 2 years, making Douleutaras a global player in the home services industry!,How we innovate in Douleutaras,We cannot revolutionize and disrupt the home services market without first starting a revolution ourselves ‚Äì internally! We are Douleutaras, we encourage autonomy, ethos, innovation and we like to move fast!,We seek our team members to have an explosive career path and a constant boost of knowledge, and we have set up specific evolution steps to make sure we achieve it ‚Äì together.,Our teams are small, empowered and autonomous. We allow teams to define the methodology desired and used. From Scrum to Kanban, as well as other practices such as test-driven methodologies and pair programming, you will be the one defining it and you will be the one guiding us towards it!,Joining Douleutaras, you will find great colleagues to assist you technically and psychologically to achieve your goals! Our environment enhances knowledge, friendliness, and excellence - even if it means spending a bit more time to achieve perfection!,We build the product together! We believe our product needs input from every source, so we encourage open expression, ideation, and participation in order to achieve a great user experience. After all, we eat our own food, we are all users of Douleutaras having a first class experience of the quality of services that we offer!,Lastly, we always give back. We encourage open source contribution and provide the time to achieve it. What comes around goes around, or else, give and it will be given to you :),Tools we use to build.,Cutting edge technology is what we use and we do not fear experimentation if this leads to product innovation or just a great tech time in the office :) Our amazing internal monitoring systems are here to protect us by providing an isolated environment on which we can go nuts! And nuts we do go!,This is an outline of our current tech:,1) Our web app is in React and Angular,2) Our Back-end is in Python running on the Django framework,3) We use Nativescript for our mobile app,4) All our applications are Dockerized,5) Our servers work on Digital Ocean and AWS,6) We like serverless technologies as we are really greedy when it comes to computing power,7) We use databases of all sorts to suit our needs: PostgreSQL, ElasticSearch, Memcached.,8) Data Science is viciously used as it makes us stand out from the crowd! Python here my friends!,If you are curious to find out more about our tech stack, send us an email. We love wasting time and talking tech!,About this role,As a Software Engineer (Back-end) you will be building core capabilities and services for Douleutaras and you must be passionate about software engineering and awesome product experiences. You should care deeply about writing solid code, you closely follow industry trends and the open source community, you are curious and an avid learner. You have a strong opinion about technologies and are willing to test new ideas out. You like to move fast and get code into production because you know that your work has a positive impact on the lives of end users.,You will also be in the driving seat for installing awesome infrastructure to assist the business geographical expansion plans which require more tech power and better delivery pipelines! Bring in some horsepower and cloud capacity please!!!,Our product‚Äôs backend is in pure Python and we strictly follow Python‚Äôs best practices and coding principles. We currently make full use of the Django framework in conjunction with Django‚Äôs REST framework and numerous Django applications.,We rely on PostgreSQL for our database needs, so you will need concrete knowledge of its optimizations and host configuration. Search is done through a cluster of ElasticSearch nodes and we constantly try to optimize search times. All our asynchronous tasks are performed through Celery.,Our deployment pipeline lives on Gitlab CI and functions with a hybrid of Ansible playbooks deploying to cloud instances and Docker containers. It is rock solid with zero downtime but there is always room for improvement.,Our Front End is a combination of Angular, React and TypeScript with a tight focus on writing optimized code for the best possible user experience. Implementation follows strict UX/UI principles communicated by our talented Design team. We use Gulp to automate tasks such as bundling and minifying, SASS/SCSS for our CSS and CoffeeScript where we have deemed necessary.,Our Front End code is deployed alongside the back-end code. It goes through a Gitlab CI pipeline later bundled in with the Python application‚Äôs code for delivery.,Our mobile application is built on NativeScript using Angular to share core codebase with Front End in the most efficient way and allows us to build native mobile apps for iOS and Android drastically speeding up development and release cycle. Native iOS and Android development tools are also used to build platform- and hardware-specific components. We also strictly follow human interface design guidelines to have the most intuitive and easy-to-use mobile application for our customers.,Have we not persuaded you yet? Some more points:,1) Your opinion will be highly appreciated and valued. We only hire creative and open-minded people who are not afraid to listen to new ideas.,2) You will never walk alone! We all belong in two teams; an agile team to develop features based on our roadmap and a tech team which makes sure we buddy in the journey of code excellence,3) You will deliver high quality scalable and well-tested code by following our comprehensive coding standards and follow our coding principles.,4) You will define our infrastructure and the tools we use! As a technology company, we constantly seek to upgrade our tools. Bring in your ideas!,Ready to create a disruptive service and blast through with amazing tech? Then this might be the right job for you!,About you,1) You communicate with candor and directness and you welcome feedback without getting defensive,2) You go out of your way for your team players and do not throw the ball over the fence.,3) You project passion, positive energy and enthusiasm in whatever you do and you always champion a ‚Äúcan do better‚Äù mentality,4) You think in a ‚Äúscalable‚Äù way and are proud of the code you produce. 5) Admittedly, nothing is perfect and so refactoring is your friend. You always like to leave the code better than you found it, in fact, it‚Äôs how you code every day,5) You act like an owner and are selfless while being accountable and goal-oriented,Responsibilities,1) Participate in the agile feature/product design process working with cross-functional teams including: Product Management, Design and Operations,2) Collaborate with other engineers to share best practices and knowledge of emerging technologies,3) Implement features, products, and enhancements that improve the user experience,4) Maintain and monitor our CI/CD pipeline,5) Design, build and maintain core infrastructure pieces that allow Douleutaras to scale and support thousands of concurrent users,6) Plan the growth of our infrastructure,7) Improve the deployment process to make it as boring as possible,8) Monitor the application‚Äôs stability and analyze performance metrics,9) Deliver fully tested and documented code,Requirements,Ideally you will have,1) 1+ year of proven experience in developing web applications with Python,2) 2+ years of professional experience with enterprise architecture and developing highly scalable websites/services,3) Strong Understanding of OOP principles/design patterns,4) Proven REST services experience,5) Source control systems experience (Git),6) Experience in relational databases,7) Proficient with Linux administration,8) Hands-on experience developing, releasing, and maintaining large-scale software applications,9) Good written, verbal, and collaboration skills,10) Excellent command of English, both written and verbal,11) Experience working with a remote and multicultural team,And you will also,1) Be a self-starter with a strong work ethic and a passion for problem-solving,2) Be flexible and able to adapt to changing priorities and technologies,3) Think analytically and methodically with attention to detail,4) Refactor problematic, incomplete parts and constantly improve our codebase,5) Read, understand & debug code,6) Follow coding standards and apply good practices,7) Deliver testable, efficient, reusable, high quality and easy-to-read code,Bonus Points (if you have the below just pass by our office :) ),1) Golang, JS experience,2) Experience with Pyramid/Flask/Tornado or another Python framework,3) Experience in working with Agile Methodologies,4) Experience in a peak performance organization, preferably a tech startup,Projects you could work on:,1) Building the back-end infrastructure and API for our Mobile Applications,2) Improving the communication flow between the consumer and the home experts,3) Building organizational and scheduling features for our home experts,4) Improving our CI/CD pipelines,5) Moving our infrastructure from Digitalocean to AWS,6) Architecting our infrastructure to have the capacity for a global expansion,7) Installing monitoring and alert services,Benefits,Our core belief and reason for existence is the care and attention we show our users, our community, and our employees.,1) A transparent and motivating environment where you can thrive,2) Impact the lives of millions of customers and of the professionals, we partner with,3) Being a part of an international team of domain experts in all functions,4) Competitive compensation and potential for stock options,5) Group Health Insurance program,6) Workstation of your choice,7) An annual budget for Douleutaras/YourHero/YourPro services,8) A bespoke development plan that will allow you to utilise your potential and grow quickly,9) The pleasure of being part of a high-performance team that works hard but has plenty of fun in the process

title: Python Developer (with AWS/Azure/Google Cloud certificate)
description: The project is connected with a smart city. The goal of creating a smart city is to improve the quality of life using urban informatics technology to improve service efficiency and meet the needs of residents. The main goal is access to counters and other city systems from the phone.,The world is changing, and we must adapt! In the last few years, utility industries have started renovating to adapt to forever increasing needs of water, electricity, and other resources by introducing smart city functions at a global scale. We are trying to further this change with our platform.,We are putting all our efforts into perfecting water usage functionality by implementing various monitoring and alerting tools for our customers. To do this we try to utilize the best-suited technologies for it and use all our previous experience to create a platform that would monitor over 20 million devices hourly.,Under secure requirements, it is obligatory to have AWS Certificate or Azure Cloud Certificate, or Google Cloud Certificate (existing or expired at least).,We are looking for engineers, who are willing to experiment, learn new skills, and new ways of approaching interesting and complex tasks.,We value people:,‚Äì who are keen to express themselves, even if it might not be a popular opinion;,‚Äì who are enthusiastic about saving natural resources from depletion by helping us with our mission;,‚Äì who are willing to work on a large-scale project with a quite big range of functionality;,‚Äì who puts team effort higher than personal gain;,‚Äì who values quality over quantity.,Stack:,‚Äì 4 + years experience with Python;,‚Äì Lambdas (where most of our code sits);,‚Äì Terraform (where all our configuration sits);,‚Äì Redshift / DynamoDB / Athena / S3(Data-lake) (where all our data sits);,‚Äì SQS / SNS / API-GW (how we are communicating inside the platform);,‚Äì Amazon Kinesis / Glue / Spark (how we are transforming incoming data).,Other technologies/services/frameworks we are using:,‚Äì Cognito;,‚Äì Quicksight;,‚Äì PowerBI;,‚Äì React(for frontend app);,‚Äì Kibana stack;,‚Äì CircleCI;,‚Äì Redis.,We offer:,1. 24 calendar days of paid vacation per year (after trial period);,2. title: Senior FullStack Software Engineer (React/Python)
description: You will be a part of a team that will be working on a platform (HoReCa) ‚Äî is one of the most investment-attractive startups (USA) in the field of hospitality. In the summer of 2020, raised a new $ 50 million (and earlier received an investment from the Alexa Fund (AWS)).,UKEESS Software House is looking for a Senior FullStack Software Engineer (React/Python) to join our ambitious team for the full-time position (in Europe).,About the Customer‚Äôs Project:,This platform helps promote and sell unique guest experiences for any occasion. Platform gives control of and insight into the entire guest experience. Also, enables to automatically drive revenue & profitability by leveraging data to build direct relationships, deliver exceptional experiences, and increase repeat business. This project has been on the market for over 10 years and continues to develop actively!,About the team and Responsibilities:,Our team focused on venue groups (large entities that have many restaurants) and develop performant and highly available APIs, implement advanced algorithms, craft pixel-perfect interfaces, design architecture for observability, localize for a global audience, use data science to generate high-impact insights, scale our infrastructure, and much, much more.,Our engineering culture values technical excellence, ownership and customer obsession to solve hard problems the right way.,As a part of the team, you will:,- be exposed to the challenges of working at scale and thrive when solving complex technical problems ‚Äî whether it‚Äôs fine tuning beautiful UX and design, developing API services for our products, or just seeing features through end-to-end.,- work closely with other engineers, product managers and designers, develop in our mobile and cloud technology stack via an agile software development process, and engineer real solutions that ship directly to our customers.,- Write code based on functional specification and technical design. Adhere to architectural standards and develop designs that consider impact with other aspects of the database and appropriately leverage existing code.,- Perform code reviews, identify potential issues to reduce technical debt, and provide coding best practice recommendations.,Knowledge, Skills, And Competencies:,- At least 5 years of experience developing web applications,- Experience in Python backend,- Experience with React on front-end part,- Strong knowledge and experience with Redux, TypeScript,- Excellent interpersonal, written, and verbal communication skills.,- Strong sense of self-motivation, organization, and attention to detail; strong analytical skills,- Experience with Scrum/Agile methodology, CI/CD,- English: upper-intermediate level (both speaking and writing),It will be a plus:,-Strong knowledge or experience with NodeJS,-Experience or strong knowledge with Google Cloud Platform (GCP): AppEngine, Datastore (potentially moving to Firestore), BigQuery.,The technology stack of the Project:,Python/Django/GoogleCloud/MySQL/React/Redux/TS.

title: Data Mining Engineer needed for data centric startup
description: We're in the process of scaling our current systems and looking for a clever, flexible, and resourceful engineer to help build out our data pipelines.,Our existing pipelines scrape websites for data, clean and transform the data, then make the data available to our front end UI.,Our tech stack primarily uses Kubernetes, Docker, Airflow, PySpark, Pandas, Selenium, Postgres, S3, and gitlab for CI/CD.,You will be responsible for:,- Developing web scrapers for the Data Acquisition team and optimizing pipeline execution.,- Using pandas to normalize data.,- Creating docker images of scrapers to be deployed to kubernetes.,- Creating airflow dags to schedule pipelines.,- Developing tests to ensure proper pipeline execution.,This position requires experience developing python and writing web scrapers.,NOTE: Please make all e-mails and communications through the djinni website. Thank you.

title: Senior Python Developer
description: Project Description:,Applying to the position, you may join one of the most respected and fastest growing institutional investors in the world. The company invests in all major asset classes, including public equity, private equity, real estate, infrastructure and fixed-income instruments, and currently has offices in Toronto, London, Hong Kong, New York, S√£o Paulo, Luxembourg and Mumbai.,Client attracts and selects high-caliber individuals from top-tier institutions around the globe. title: Full Stack (Python + React) Developer

We're committed to providing equal opportunity and a sense of belonging for all Beetroot consultants and candidates. So let's discover together whether we could be an excellent fit for each other.

description: Drive-thru restaurants have employees multi-task by taking orders, packing food, taking payments, and more. This translates to long wait times and extremely high stress for employees. Currently, the restaurants are experiencing a major hiring crisis due to this extreme stress and increasing minimum wage.,Most quick-service restaurants had begun to search for a more elegant solution that improves customer experience, increases speed, accuracy, average ticket size, and reduces employee stress.,Our AI greets the customer, takes the order, and inserts it into the point of sale freeing up the employees to focus on other tasks.,Understanding an order in the drive-thru using voice is not an easy task and requires deep technology to get to the required high completion rate of orders. The challenges include a very noisy environment, unique speech patterns due to the customer's indecisiveness, different accents, gender, ages, speech from other people in the car, complex multi-turn unstructured conversation, low latency, and more. In order to solve big challenges, we are developing our own speech and natural language understanding tech from the ground up.,We are a group of experts in Speech, NLU, and Backend SW. We strongly believe in impact-driven employment where you can work from wherever you're most comfortable and effective. Because of the myriad of challenges and the fast pace, each team member gets to experience a lot of professional growth and ownership.,About the Role & Responsibilities:,- Our backend is developed all in Python running in the cloud over k8s.,- It's not a typical backend interacting with a UI frontend. It handles audio streams in real-time and runs our key AI algorithms.,- The role involves designing and implementing complex parts of the backend. This involves distributed architecture as well as concurrency while taking into consideration performance and scale.,Requirements,- 5+ years experience in Python,- Experience in SW design and backend dev,- Developed and deployed multiple projects used in production,- Experience with Docker, Kubernetes, Microservices, CI/CD, Clouds (AWS/GCP/Azure),- experience with async IO, threading, or concurrent programming,- deep control of Python 3 and its standard library.,Preferred Qualifications:,- Experience with real-time audio processing,Join us to be a part of an amazing team with great vibes, a company with a lot of freedom of movement, interesting and unique challenges, and an opportunity to influence and build something big.

title: Senior Python Engineer

title: Python Full Stack Developer
